titleInfo.title: On the Notion of Effective Impedance for Finite and Infinite Networks

mods.abstract: We consider two approaches to an effective impedance of an AC network. In the first one, we consider it as a complex-valued function of complex parameter. In the second one, we consider an effective impedance as an element of the ordered field of rational functions with real coefficients.
